note:
Same handle, new site.

***I'm trying out multiple servers based on my interests, with the goal of allowing moderation of my content by others so they can follow what interests we have in common and ignore all the rest.

I'm hoping this will permit me to use CW's both more sparingly & purposefully, & entirely based on the focus of that specific server.

My goal is to curate an online "safe space" to be myself, while also giving others the space to do similar, with mutual respect!***
